SELECT MS_ROLE.MS_ROLE_ID,
MS_ROLE.MS_BUMON_ID,
MS_ROLE.ADMIN_FLAG, MS_ROLE.NAME1, MS_ROLE.NAME2, MS_ROLE.NAME3, MS_ROLE.ENABLE_FLAG,
MS_ROLE.RENEW_DATE, MS_ROLE.RENEW_USER_ID, MS_ROLE.TS
FROM MS_ROLE
WHERE DELETE_FLAG = 0
AND ( MS_ROLE.NAME1 LIKE :NAME OR MS_ROLE.NAME2 LIKE :NAME OR MS_ROLE.NAME3 LIKE :NAME )
ORDER BY MS_ROLE.NAME1, MS_ROLE.NAME2, MS_ROLE.NAME3, MS_ROLE.MS_BUMON_ID, MS_ROLE.ADMIN_FLAG DESC

INSERT INTO MS_ROLE( MS_ROLE_ID ,
MS_BUMON_ID ,
ADMIN_FLAG , NAME1 , NAME2 , NAME3 , ENABLE_FLAG ,
RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( nextval('SEQ_MS_ROLE_ID') ,
:MS_BUMON_ID ,
:ADMIN_FLAG , :NAME1 , :NAME2 , :NAME3 , :ENABLE_FLAG ,
:RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE MS_ROLE SET MS_BUMON_ID = :MS_BUMON_ID ,
ADMIN_FLAG = :ADMIN_FLAG , NAME1 = :NAME1 , NAME2 = :NAME2 , NAME3 = :NAME3 , ENABLE_FLAG = :ENABLE_FLAG ,
RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE MS_ROLE_ID = :MS_ROLE_ID AND TS = :TS
